objects.text:
• Handcrafted premium leather
• Cushioned insole with mint lining
• Distinctive scalloped design
• Traditional craftsmanship

product_details.name: Vintage Leather Artisan Sneaker - Hand-Decorated Bohemian Comfort
product_details.description:
• Handcrafted premium leather upper with unique decorative patterns
• Comfortable cushioned insole with mint-colored lining
• Durable rubber outsole with bubble texture for enhanced grip
• Distinctive scalloped design elements and artistic detailing
• Rustic brown leather laces complement the natural tones
• Perfect blend of traditional craftsmanship and modern comfort
• Lightweight and flexible construction for all-day wear
• Available in natural tan and cream color combination
• Eye-catching bohemian-inspired embellishments
• Ideal for casual wear and artistic fashion statements

banner_details:
This banner features a stylish, grid-based layout divided into four quadrants with a clean, earthy aesthetic. The top left quadrant houses bold, attention-grabbing title text elements labeled `heading_1` and `heading_2`, followed by a subtler supporting tagline `tagline` in a minimalist, tech-inspired font. The top right quadrant showcases the product image `product_image`, a bohemian-styled sneaker, artfully crafted and prominently displayed. The bottom left quadrant lists key product features via the `description` text layer using bullet points. The bottom right quadrant includes promotional and call-to-action elements: the `price` displayed prominently in large, white font and a brown `cta_button` with "SHOP NOW" in the center (`cta`).

**Color Palette:**
- Beige: `#FBF7F2`
- Sand: `#E4C5A0`
- Tan: `#D6B88E`
- Brown: `#BD8E58`, `#A67B45`, `#5D3A1E`
- Accents: Off-white `#FFF1DE`, muted gold/brown tones
product_color: The product image features a sneaker with a warm, earthy color palette that blends shades of beige, caramel, and burnt orange. The colors are layered smoothly, with gradient transitions from light tan (#F4D6A0) to deep rust orange (#B95727), creating a soft, natural blending effect that still highlights specific design elements like the laces and seams. Accents of creamy white (#FAF3E0) trace the decorative outlines, adding contrast and emphasis. The sole introduces deeper tones like chestnut brown (#7B3F00), enriching the overall palette. This color scheme evokes warmth, comfort, and handcrafted elegance—ideal for a stylish, cozy-themed advertisement banner.
